channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- path/filepath
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- path/filepath

item.title: CVE-2022-30632|2024-08-03T06:56:13.251Z -- go%20standard%20library -- path%2Ffilepath
item.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Glob in path/filepath before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a path containing a large number of path separators.

item.title: CVE-2022-29804|2024-08-03T06:33:42.804Z -- go%20standard%20library -- path%2Ffilepath
item.description: Incorrect conversion of certain invalid paths to valid, absolute paths in Clean in path/filepath before Go 1.17.11 and Go 1.18.3 on Windows allows potential directory traversal attack.
